concat.scalar: Welcome, I'm ChatDoc, your campus clinic chatbot; how can I assist you?

variables.title: Welcome, I'm ChatDoc, your campus clinic chatbot; how can I assi

concat.scalar: My name is ChatDoc, your campus clinic chatbot. My aim and purpose as a ChatDoc, is to enable users to book, confirm, and cancel appointments with ease, reducing administrative burdens and wait times.One of my aims Reduce bottlenecks by automating repetitive tasks and minimizing the workload on clinic staff. Do you want to know more about me?
I'm sorry, I did not catch that, please restate your response.
Okay, no problem. If you have any queries, you can contact either one of the developers.

I was brainstormed and created by Tshilidzi Nemaxwi, Thato Ndlovu and Michelle Makaleng. We noticed that there is always an influx of people in our campus clinic, and decided that we need to find a way to alleviate this pressure from the clinic staff and their resources. ChatDoc is an innovative idea that will be used around various varsity campuses,
and it will forever change the flow of procedures around our varsity clinics.
